All.name: CresGarurumon AA
All.maineffect: [When Digivolving] Activate 1 of the effects below. ・Choose any number of your opponent's Digimon whose play costs add up to 6 or less and return them to the bottom of their owner's deck. ・ Digivolve 1 of your other Digimon into a level 6 or lower Digimon card with [Greymon] in its name without paying its cost. ・You may DNA Digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand by paying its cost.
All.soureeffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has [Omnimon] in its name, return 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon to the bottom of their deck.

All.name: ShadowSeraphimon AA
All.maineffect: [Opponent's Turn] When a card is removed from your security stack, ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ on 1 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash up to 1 card from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards). [On Deletion] ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack). Then, 1 of your opponent’s Digimon gets -4000 DP for the turn for each card in your security stack.

All.name: BlitzGreymon AA
All.maineffect: [When Digivolving] Activate 1 of the effects below. ・ ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ on 3 of your opponent's Digimon. ・ Digivolve 1 of your other Digimon into a level 6 or lower Digimon card with [Garurumon] in its name without paying its cost. ・You may DNA Digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand by paying its cost.
All.soureeffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has [Omnimon] in its name, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.

All.name: Falcomon AA
All.maineffect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 purple Digimon card with [Ravemon] in its name or [Bird] in one of its traits and 1 [Keenan Crier] among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
All.soureeffect: [On Deletion] If not deleted by battle, your opponent trashes 1 card in their hand.

All.name: Peckmon AA
All.maineffect: [When Digivolving] If you don't have [Keenan Crier] in play, you may play 1 [Keenan Crier] from your hand without paying the cost.
All.soureeffect: [On Deletion] If not deleted by battle, your opponent trashes 1 card in their hand.

All.name: Crowmon AA
All.maineffect: [When Attacking] If you have a purple Tamer in play, this Digimon may digivolve into [Ravemon] in your hand for the digivolution cost.
All.soureeffect: [On Deletion] If not deleted by battle, delete 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon.

All.name: Ravemon AA
All.maineffect: ＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon). [End of Attack] By deleting this Digimon that has a digivolution card with [Bird] in one of its traits, at the end of your opponent's turn, play 1 [Ravemon] from your trash without paying the cost. [On Deletion] If your opponent has 8 or more cards in their hand, they trash 1 card in their hand. Then, if your opponent has 7 or fewer cards in their hand, they add the top card of their security stack to their hand.

All.name: Omnimon Alter-S AA
All.maineffect: [When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 8000 DP or less, then return 1 of your opponent's level 6 or lower Digimon to the bottom of its owner's deck. [All Turns] When this Digimon would leave the battle area for a reason other than one of your effects, play 1 [BlitzGreymon] and 1 [CresGarurumon] from this Digimon's digivolution cards without paying their cost. Then, place this Digimon on bottom of your security stack face down.

All.name: Matt Ishida & Tai Kamiya AA
All.maineffect: [Your Turn] When you play a [Gabumon]/[Agumon], you may suspend this Tamer to gain 1 memory. [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Digimon digivolves and you have 1 or fewer Digimon in play, you may play 1 [Gabumon] if that Digimon has [Greymon] in its name or 1 [Agumon]if that Digimon has [Garurumon] in its name from your hand or trash without paying its cost.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

All.name: Kiriha Aonuma & Nene Amano AA
All.maineffect: The name of this card/Tamer is also treated as [Kiriha Aonuma]/[Nene Amano]. [Start of Your Main Phase] If you there are 2 or more Digimon in play, gain 1 memory. [All Turns] When you would play 1 Digimon card with the [Blue Flare] trait or [Twilight] trait with DigiXros requirements, by suspending this Tamer, you may place 1 card from under your Tamers and 1 card from your trash as digivolution cards for a DigiXros.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

All.name: Henry Wong & Shu-Chong Wong AA
All.maineffect: [Start of Your Main Phase] If you have 1 or fewer Digimon in play, you may play 1 [Terriermon]/[Lopmon] from your hand without paying the cost. Digimon played by this effect can't digivolve and are deleted at the end of your opponent's turn. [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon with [Terriermon]/[Lopmon] in its digivolution cards would digivolve, by suspending this Tamer, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

All.name: Keenan Crier AA
All.maineffect: [Start of Your Turn] If you have 2 memory or less, set your memory to 3. [All Turns] When one of your purple Digimon with [Ravemon] in its name or [Bird] in one of its traits is deleted, by suspending this Tamer, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck). If that Digimon was deleted by an effect, gain 1 memory.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.

All.name: Trident Gaia AA
All.maineffect: [Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the highest DP. If a Digimon with 13000 DP or more is deleted by this effect, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

All.name: Adze Beast Blade and Shining Dragon Bullet AA
All.maineffect: [Main] Activate 1 of the effects below. ・If you have [CresGarurumon] in play, 1 of your [Agumon]/[Greymon] may digivolve into [BlitzGreymon] in your hand, ignoring digivolution requirements and without paying the cost. ・If you have [BlitzGreymon] in play, 1 of your [Gabumon]/[Garurumon] may digivolve into [CresGarurumon] in your hand, ignoring digivolution requirements and without paying the cost.
All.soureeffect: [Security] You may play 1 [Gabumon]/[Agumon] from your hand or trash without paying the cost. Then, add this card to your hand.

All.name: Full Metal Blaze AA
All.maineffect: [Main] Return 2 of your opponent's level 4 or lower Digimon to their owners' hands. Then, if your opponent has 8 or more cards in their hand, return 1 of your opponent's level 6 or higher Digimon to the bottom of its owner's deck.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

All.name: Heaven's Judgement AA
All.maineffect: While you have a green Digimon or Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements. [Main] Activate the effect below. For each color your Digimon have, activate it. ・1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -6000 DP for the turn.
All.soureeffect: [Security] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -12000 DP for the turn.

All.name: Gaia Reactor AA
All.maineffect: [Main] Choose 1 of each player's Digimon with the highest play cost. Delete all other Digimon.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

All.name: Dirty Hero AA
All.maineffect: While you have a green Digimon or Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements. [Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's level 3 Digimon. Then place this card in your battle area. ＜Delay＞ (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.) ・[Main] Your opponent may trash 1 Option card in their hand. If they do not trash a card, gain 2 memory.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.

All.name: Ame-no-Ohabari AA
All.maineffect: [Main] By deleting 1 of your Digimon, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon whose level is less than or equal to that Digimon. If one of your Digimon with [Ravemon] in its name was deleted by this effect, at the end of your opponent's turn, play 1 [Ravemon] from your trash without paying the cost.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Delete 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with the lowest level.

All.name: Digital Translator AA
All.maineffect: This card is also treated as having [Plug-In] in its name. While you have a Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements. [Main] Choose 1 of your level 6 Digimon. It may digivolve into a level 6 Digimon card in your hand with a different name that includes the name of the chosen Digimon, ignoring digivolution requirements and without paying the cost.
All.soureeffect: [Security] Return 1 Digimon card from your trash to your hand, and add this card to your hand.

All.name: Omnimon Alter-B AA
All.maineffect: [When Digivolving] ＜De-Digivolve 3＞ on 1 of your opponent's Digimon (Trash up to 3 cards from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards). Then, choose any number of your opponent's Digimon so that their play cost total is up to 6 and delete them. [When Attacking] By trashing up to 3 level 6 or higher cards in this Digimon's digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers with the lowest play cost for each card trashed. If you trashed 3 cards, trash the top 2 cards of your opponent's security stack.

All.name: ShineGreymon: Ruin Mode AA
All.maineffect: [When Digivolving] [On Deletion] Until the end of your opponent's next turn, all of your opponent's Digimon get -5000DP. [End of Attack] Delete this Digimon and 1 of your opponent's Digimon, and ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack). Then, if you have a Tamer in play, hatch 1 Digi-Egg card to an empty space in your breeding area.
